name: Direct Bug Reporting
tagline: An Android library to help you get error reports from your users
body:
# DirectBugReporting
An Android library to help you get error reports from your users

## Usage

1. Download library .AAR package, then put it in your libs folder

To show report dialog, in which user can fill issue details use this code:

**for Github**

`GithubService service = new GithubService("RepositoryName");
service.create(null);
IssueDialog dialog = new IssueDialog.Builder(context)
.setService(service)
.show();`

**for Redmine**

`int projectId = 1; //your redmine project ID
RedmineService service = new RedmineService(projectId);
service.create("http://yourredmineurl/");
IssueDialog dialog = new IssueDialog.Builder(context)
.setService(service)
.show();`

## Download

Download [the latest AAR][2]
